Membership
People agree, The Founders Club is an experience that's difficult to replicate.
The Founders Club emulates the traditional Scottish Links design with moss-covered centuries-old oaks, pines and palm trees highlighting a buffer of lush natural landscape.
As a member, you and¬†your family will enjoy a¬†Golf and Social Club lifestyle that includes:
18-Hole Robert Trent Jones, Jr. Private, Member-Owned Signature¬†Championship Course
Newly renovated and spacious Practice Facility with Complimentary Pro-V1 Practice Balls
The intimacy of a Club with only 275 Golf Memberships
Weekly Men and Ladies Groups.
Members Only TFC Learning Center equipped with FlightScope for custom fitting and best quality instruction by our PGA Professionals
Membership includes Men's and Ladies' Lockers, Golf Bag Storage and registration of your handicap using the GHIN system
Tennis, Exercise, Yoga and Pilates classes that are included in membership dues
Full Calendar of Golf and Social Events
The very BEST¬†and most welcoming Membership in Sarasota!
MEMBERSHIP OFFERINGS
Signature Golf Memberships
Membership at our Signature level includes unlimited use of our 18-hole Robert Trent Jones, Jr. golf course paying cart fee Only. Walking is always available and Golf Members have access to our traditional caddy program. Unlimited access to the practice range offering complimentary usage of Pro V1 balls, a private locker in the well-appointed Membership Golf Hall locker room, golf club storage, towel service, shoe cleaning, complimentary bottled water, fruit and coffee are all included. Additionally, access to the 24 hour state-of-the-art fitness facility, Pilates, Yoga and tennis clinics are also included. Casual dining in our Grille Room or more formal dining in the Main Hall are available with open invitation to all Club events and activities.
Associate Golf Membership
Membership at our Associate level provides access for twelve (12) 18-hole rounds of cart fee only golf from November through April. Associate Golf Members also enjoy unlimited golf access from May to October and use of all additional Club amenities mentioned above throughout the entire year.
Social Memberships
Social Members have access to all non-golf Club amenities listed above year-round and may play golf from May through October for a reduced fee. Participation in all social Club amenities, activities and events is highly encouraged.
If interested please ask for details.
Juliette Valin, Director of Membership
(941) 371-9720
Don‚Äôt let the best golf opportunity in Sarasota pass you by. Click here to
g
et more info

#mSubNav .mobileShow
Club Events & Programs
Year-round fund, fitness and fine living
A year-round calendar of activities makes living and membership here a unique and enriching experience. The Founders Golf and Social Club will customize it all for you.¬† Please explore our Club newsletters with their activity packed sport, wellness and¬†social calendars to the left for a glimpse into Sarasota's finest Golf and Social Club.
A sampling of ongoing programs, activities and events:
GOLF
Traditional caddie program
Nine & Dine
Weekly Men‚Äôs and Ladies‚Äô ‚ÄúGames‚Äù
Member-Guest Scrambles
Swing clinics
State-of-the-art, indoor-outdoor golf teaching facility
Sport massage and stretching programs
JUNIOR TENNIS & GOLF PROGRAMS
Complimentary golf and tennis clinics weekly
Summer Golf Camps providing in depth instruction over the course of several days.
Special holiday events for family fun!
WELLNESS & FINE LIVING PROGRAMS
Personalized fitness programs
Tennis instruction
Pilates and yoga classes
Member-Guest cocktail parties
Chef‚Äôs Table ‚Äì A gourmet degustation and wine pairing experience
Wine tastings
Gourmet cooking classes
Luxury auto showcases
Monthly mixers
Weekend cookouts and holiday buffets

Meetings and Corporate Events
The Perfect Meeting Place
Mix business with pleasure for a productive day away from the office. We provide everything you need to impress your colleagues and inspire your employees. The executive chef can provide personalized menus to fit your event, while our experienced team goes above and beyond to create a flawless event for you and your guests.
WE PROVIDE PERSONALIZED SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL ACCOMMODATIONS FOR A VARIETY OF BUSINESS FUNCTIONS, INCLUDING:
Formal Meetings
Business Dinners
Team Building Sessions
Corporate & Client Golf Outings
Employee Play Days
Seminars
Conferences
Professional trainings
Book presentations
Board meetings
Our executive private room is perfect for business meetings and small dining events for up to 26 guests. The room features floor-to-ceiling windows afford attendees spectacular views and copious natural light, is equipped with AV and conferencing technology, and complimentary WiFi
The Scotsman room seats up to 125 people
For more information or to schedule an appointment for a tour of the venue, please contact us at your convenience.
(941) 371-9720¬† |
Email Us

Venue
Thank you for considering The Founders Golf Club for
your special event!
The Founders Golf Club features exceptional indoor and outdoor venues that are the perfect setting for a variety of private events.
Please contact us for more information regarding specific availability at (941) 371-9720 or
dmclaughlin@thefoundersgolfclub.com
.
Golf Hall
The 24,000-square-foot clubhouse, acclaimed for its understated low-country architecture, features a grand foyer and offers four elegant dining areas. The dining areas open up to a private Oak Lawn Verandah accessorized with a stone-brick fireplace. Functions can be held in one of the following rooms within Golf Hall.
SCOTSMAN ROOM
Sophisticated decor and sweeping views through the many luxuriously draped windows set the perfect mood for an unforgettable evening. The Scotsman Room offers an inside formal dining setting which accommodates seating for up to 120 people.
GILLESPIE ROOM
Trimmed in dark mahogany, with an inviting decor, The Gillespie Grille Room features the beautifully appointed bar and a large fireplace. Glass doors lead to a charming outdoor veranda, offering panoramic views of the plush golf course.
OAK LAWN
Century-old moss-covered oaks in a lush golf fairway scenery with golf course views is a dramatic setting for ceremonies and outside receptions accommodating up to 250 guests.
GRAND VERANDAH
The Verandah provides beautiful panoramic views of the course, creating that coveted balance of outdoor and indoor spaces to entertain your guests.
EXECUTIVE ROOM
Our executive private room is perfect for business meetings and small dining events for up to 26 guests. The room features floor-to-ceiling windows, providing attendees spectacular views and copious natural light. The room is equipped with AV, conferencing technology, and complimentary WiFi.
Hosting tournaments of all sizes, our Golf course provides an incredible backdrop for the perfect round!
GOLF COURSE AND PRACTICE FACILITY
Following the ancient contours of traditional Scottish Links Courses, The Founders Golf Club‚Äôs 18-hole championship course, designed by Robert Trent Jones, Jr. takes its cues from the gently rolling terrain. The Golf Course engages the strategic thinking of players at all skills levels.
For more information or to schedule an appointment for a tour of the venue, please contact David McLaughlin, Clubhouse Manager, at
dmclaughlin@thefoundersgolfclub.com
.
